statements: SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_status FROM patient_outcomes WHERE survival_days > 30;
SELECT treatment_id, outcome_status FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_status = 'improved';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, outcome_status, survival_days FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_status = 'stable' ORDER BY survival_days DESC;
SELECT count(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(survival_days) AS avg_survival_days FROM patient_outcomes GROUP BY outcome_status;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_status FROM patient_outcomes WHERE survival_days > 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_status = 'Recovered' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, survival_days FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_status = 'Deteriorated' ORDER BY survival_days ASC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_status, survival_days FROM patient_outcomes WHERE treatment_id = '4321b0c4-5b4a-4f16-9c22-864ea3180c8d';
SELECT MAX(survival_days) AS max_survival_days FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_status = 'Improved';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT age, gender, outcome FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, age, treatment_id FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT patient_id, gender, outcome FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, outcome FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT patients.gender, treatments.treatment_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT treatment_id, COUNT(*) as patient_count FROM patients GROUP BY treatment_id HAVING patient_count > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_id = 1;
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, survival_rate, assessment_date FROM SurvivalRates WHERE survival_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY assessment_date;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, survival_rate FROM Patients JOIN SurvivalRates ON Patients.patient_id = SurvivalRates.patient_id WHERE survival_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, treatment FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, age, gender, treatment FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_type, outcome_description FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_type='Positive';
SELECT * FROM survival_rates WHERE survival_rate BETWEEN 80.00 AND 90.00;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, treatment FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_type, outcome_description FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Recovery';
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT id, treatment_name, survival_rate FROM treatments JOIN survival_rates ON treatments.id = survival_rates.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis='Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, treatment FROM survival_rates ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM outcomes WHERE patient_id=1;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM treatment_strategies WHERE strategy_id=2;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50 AND diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%'

SELECT p.name, o.outcome_description, s.survival_rate FROM patients p INNER JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id INNER JOIN survival_rates s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id WHERE s.survival_rate > 80
SELECT p.name, ts.strategy_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN patient_strategies ps ON p.patient_id = ps.patient_id INNER JOIN treatment_strategies ts ON ps.strategy_id = ts.strategy_id
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM patients
